title: Pen.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
Good morning Pen

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

title: Pen.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
One thing I like to ask folks I meet is
how'd you end up here

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
My family sold me after our harvest didn't make enough money
I mean, what are you expecting?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
I've heard that one before
seems to be pretty common

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
yeah, how about you?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
Someone I thought I could trust betrayed me

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
what?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
yeah, business partner invited me over
turns out he also invited some slavers

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
jesus christ

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
yeah it was all over after that

title: Pen.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer Pen_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Pen.AddToEscapeQuest]]
[[Not really...|Pen.EndDialog]]

title: Pen.Day2.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
Morning Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
Hey Pen

title: Pen.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
Pen do you still feel, uh

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
angry? yeah I do
I don't understand how someone does that

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
I don't either
at least in my case I got sold so the bank doesn't default on some loan

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
Is that any better though?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
not really

title: Pen.Day3.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
Pen, morning

title: Pen.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
You got anything to discuss?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
Nah not really
I did get us some better equipment though
should be available tomorrow

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
how did you manage that?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
been talking to the guy who has to haul all the equipment around
I've been giving him extra food
finally came through on me

title: Pen.Day4.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
thanks pen

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
no problem
[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Pen.Day4.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
Hey pen

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
how are you feeling today emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
fucking awful

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
don't we all

[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>

title: Pen.Day5.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
hey emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
hey pen
you gonna ask me something?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
mmm yeah
you got any good memories?
like from before all this

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
well

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
like the first boy you kissed?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
I ain't exactly into boys, pen

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
oh

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
her name was sarah though
still think about her once in a while
<<CampEventController upgradeArmorLevel>>
[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Pen.Day6.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
hi emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
hey...pen
[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Pen.Day6.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
hey pen

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
hey emma
wanna ask me something

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
yeah, I was wondering if you had any good memories yourself

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
oh, well, I used to be a grocer
part of my job was working the bakery
my favorite part of that was making wedding cakes

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
wedding cakes?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
yeah. they were simple, meant to feed a lot of people
I miss that
[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Pen.Day7.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
morning pen

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
morning emma
[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Pen.Day7.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
you got any more stories pen?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
how about the time I ran away

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
you...escaped?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
Old place that owned me had pretty lax security
one day we just kinda ran for it
me an a few others

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
oh, how far did you get?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
we were out for a few days
slave catchers though, they're worse than the slavers
they take a sick pleasure in hunting runaways down
like it's some kind of sport
wouldn't let up for three whole days

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
what happened?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
I collapsed from exhaustion, i thought I was going to die

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
they took you back?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
I...don't want to talk about what they did

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
..okay
[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>

hey

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
so emma
how are you?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
I'm tired, as usual

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>

[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Pen.Day9.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
Why do we keep going

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
I don't know emma
I don't know
[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Pen.Day10.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
pen

title: Pen.Day10.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
hey pen
when you escaped...how was it
did you feel free? even for a moment?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
well if you must ask, yeah I did
for a few hours before we knew they were chasing us
i've never felt so alive
I'd keep reliving those hours over and over

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_silent>>
you stopped

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer pen_default_talking>>
yeah, it just felt like I was reliving something I'd never get back
I can't be an optimist
I'll die from heartbreak
[[....|Pen.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Pen.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Pen>>
Escape? Here? You have a plan?
I'll help you, whatever it takes

title: Pen.EndDialog
body: Empty Text
